articles.title: Denisovan Mucus Gene May Have Helped Humans Survive in The Americas - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Our ancestors are known to have gotten frisky with other, now-extinct species of humans, leaving traces in our DNA to this day.
articles.content: Our ancestors are known to have gotten frisky with other, now-extinct species of humans, leaving traces in our DNA to this day. A new analysis has found that a certain genetic variant inherited from … [+3688 chars]

articles.title: The fall trip to the pharmacy for a Covid shot may be strewn with obstacles - Politico
